newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 6.93 pct at Italy lira repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 6.93 pct at Italy lira repo tender.

text.p: The minimum rate at Tuesday's 10 trillion lire 6-day Bank of Italy repurchase tender was 6.93 percent, compared with 6.83 percent at the previous repo tender on July 3, the Bank said.
The average rate was 6.96 percent against 6.85 percent at the last repurchase pact for 7.5 trillion lire and 29 days.
The Bank said it received 38 bids of which 14 were met in full and five in part.
